price: 105 Tu as accompli ta vision en laquelle tu as cru[1152]. » C’est ainsi que Nous récompensons les hommes de bien.
arabic: قَدۡ صَدَّقۡتَ ٱلرُّءۡيَآۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
footnotes: [1152] En étant déterminé à sacrifier ton fils.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qad ṣaddaqta al-ru'yā innā kadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
